# id: TransportForceMergeAction -> @Override     protected ShardsIterator shards(ClusterState clusterState, ForceMergeRequest request, String[] concreteIndices)
commentText: The refresh request works against *all* shards.
codeText: @Override_    protected ShardsIterator shards(ClusterState clusterState, ForceMergeRequest request, String[] concreteIndices) {_        return clusterState.routingTable().allShards(concreteIndices)__    }
